attributes.action: Get Boris Johnson to actually answer questions at PMQs
attributes.additional_details: To ensure that the government is held to account and explains in clear concise language the answer to all questions posed during the weekly Parliamentary Question Time
attributes.background: I would like the speaker to insist that the Prime Minister actually answered questions put to him at PMQs

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
